name: This Game Is For You 2023
description:
Hi there. This is a horror game made just for you. 

In This Game Is For You 2023, you must complete 5 challenges in order to claim back your personal data and defeat the game. Each challenge is different and unique + they each have a new "friend" for you to meet.

NOTABLE FEATURES:
  • 5 different challenges each with a new spooky character to meet.
  • A playable menu area.
  • Pick up, drop, and throw around some objects that can be interacted with.
  • A save system that saves the last challenge you were playing, so you can leave the game and play more later if you wish.
  • An entity trying to steal your computer's personal data.
  • Jumpscares!
EXTRA INFO:

Be sure to leave a rating to let me know how you felt about the game. If you enjoyed this game, consider donating to support me in making more games for you all! Consider checking out my other games as well if you have the time!

Follow me on Twitter: @omogonix
